data.title: Gregory Peck Official Website
data.meta_description: In honor of Gregory’s 100th, a dynamic, interactive website to learn about tribute events around the world, to explore his timeline, favorite places, never before published photos and clips, and to share your favorite memory of the beloved screen legend about whom Harper Lee said: “Atticus Finch gave Gregory Peck the chance to play himself.
data.text: When someone gets killed during a bank robbery by Deans, half-breed Billy Two Hats and their partner, the robbers flee. Sheriff Gifford tracks the robbers, killing one of them and capturing… See full summary »
